thread.title: University lecturers shed 'light' on National Poetry Day (University of Bolton)
thread.title_full: University lecturers shed 'light' on National Poetry Day (University of Bolton) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: University lecturers shed 'light' on National Poetry Day (University of Bolton)
text: ( Source : University of Bolton ) Posted on Monday 5th October 2015 University of Bolton lecturer Anne Caldwell The University of Bolton , in partnership with Bolton Libraries and Live from Worktown Festival , is celebrating National Poetry Day
